info.description:
A comprehensive service framework API with multi-tenant support, user management, authentication, and authorization.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require Bearer token authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:
`Authorization: Bearer <your_jwt_token>`

## Error Responses
All error responses follow a standard format with success, error code, and message fields.
info.title: Service Framework API

get.description: Check if the API is running and healthy

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT token
Create a new licence type (requires authentication, super admin only)

delete.description: Delete a licence type by ID (requires authentication, super admin only)

400.description: ID is required or Invalid ID

get.description: Get list of all licence types (requires authentication, super admin only)
Get a specific licence type by ID (requires authentication, super admin only)

400.description: ID is required or Invalid ID

put.description: Update an existing licence type (requires authentication, super admin only)

post.description: Register a new tenant organization with an admin user
Add a new user to the authenticated tenant (requires authentication)
post.summary: Add a new user to tenant

delete.description: Delete a tenant (requires authentication, authorized roles only)

get.description: Get list of all tenants (requires authentication, super admin only)

403.description: Not authorized to get this resource

get.description: Get tenant details by ID (requires authentication)

403.description: Not authorized to get this resource

put.description: Update tenant details (requires authentication, authorized roles only)

post.description: Reset user password using the reset token received via email
Request a password reset token to be sent to the user's email

put.description: Update user details (requires authentication, tenant admin or self)

400.description: Invalid request body or User ID format

403.description: Not authorized to update this user

delete.description: Delete a user from the tenant (requires authentication, tenant admin only)

400.description: Invalid User ID format or User ID is required

403.description: You cannot delete yourself or not authorized

get.description: Get all users for the authenticated tenant (requires authentication, tenant admin only)

403.description: Not authorized to get all users

get.description: Get list of all available user roles (requires authentication, tenant admin only)

403.description: Not authorized to get this resource

post.description: Verify user email address using the verification token sent via email

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
